content:
Hi, I've recently picked up an issue (my first in the rust repository!)
and I wanted to know if someone could take a look at that : https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/94310.
(Needs to see the issue to understand this) : I haven't made the changes to the code yet but I would like confirmation of my guesswork before doing so.

here is the PR that resulted as a discussion on the issue
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/95280
